Content:

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <Crupti> If you publish a press release you also can get professional mediaÂ´s attention - suddenly you have Mike on Bloomberg Technology talking about PBaaS ðŸ˜„ Or on TechCrunch.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <Crupti> But, it is very hard to get noticed, even with a well-written press release. If you REALLY want to get noticed by the big tech media weÂ´ll have to pay a professional media company - theyÂ´ll write the story and use their network to get it published in notable media outlets like TV and the big tech magazines online. ThatÂ´s how the big boys (and gals) do it in tech. But it can cost a lot of money.
